text: (Muhanmado izen no) shito-tachi ga (noko wa sa reta min no moto de) issai no kibō o ushinatta toki, soshite kare-ra (shito-tachi) ga (fu shinkō-sha ni taisuru arrā kara no shōri no yakusoku no) kitai ga motenaku natta to omoikonda toki, ware no tasuke ga kare-ra (shito) ni ori, ware no hossuru mono ni sukui wa kuru nodearu. Tada tsumi o okashita mono wa, waga chōbatsu wa manukare rarenai
